Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small Qualgebra Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small Qualgebra AllSmallQualgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic qualgebra models from orders 2 to 4.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of Qualgebra formulas(Qualgebra).
(x*y)*z = (x*z)*(x*y).
x+y=y+(x*y).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has no dependencies .
